1.「やァ <pc>君。| 先ほどは 見苦しい所を見せてしまったね。| 前回の非礼と:

|last time.

That loupe I gave to my sister. I used to|dream of being a scholar. I used to never tire|of looking through illustrated books when I|
|was a kid.

8.「でも結局 僕は 家業を継ぐことを優先した。| 今の仕事は好きだし 向いているみ: But in the end, I decided to take over the|family business. I like my job, I'm good at|it, and it's going great. But...

9.「正直 負い目があったんだ。: To be honest, I felt guilty.

10.「ヒーたんが 考古学者になったのは| 僕が あきらめざるを得なかった 夢を| 代: I thought that when He-Tan became an|archaeologist, he was trying to take the place|of the dream I had to give up.

11.「だから それで ヒーたんが苦しむのは| 我慢ならなかった。あのルーペが呪縛にな: So I couldn't stand to see Heetan suffer|because of it. I couldn't allow that loupe to|become a curse and cause my sister to suffer.

12.「だけど さっきの あの子の言葉を聞いて | 心が 軽くなった気がしたよ。彼女は: But after hearing her words earlier, I felt|lightened. I realized that she had already|been pursuing her own dream!

13.「メルシー <pc>君！ あんな妹だが| これからも 仲良くしてやってくれたまえ: Merci <pc>! She's such a little|sister, but please continue to be good to her.

14.「おっと……そろそろ 船の時間が近いようだ。| 名残惜しいが もう行かないと。|: Oops...looks like it's almost time for the|boat. I'm sorry to leave you, but I have to|go. Farewell <pc>! Have a nice trip!

15.「うーん 気持ちいいな！| こういうの 一度 やってみたかったんだ。| 行儀が悪: This feels so good! I've always wanted to try|something like this. It's so badass, but it's|so exciting!

16.「きれいだなぁ……| リンジャーラたちも こんな風に| 星を 見ていたんだろうか: It's so beautiful...I wonder if Linjara and|the others were looking at the stars like|this.

17.「兄の 言うとおりなんだ。 | キミが苦労して 手記を 手に入れてくれたのに|: My brother was right. You went through all|that trouble to receive the journal, and I|couldn't do anything about it.

18.「さ……最初は 新発見かと 注目されたのだが | 証拠となる遺跡が見つからなくて:
Well... at first, it was touted as a new|discovery, but since no archaeological|evidence has been found to support it, no one|
|listens to me anymore. I'm not sure.

19.「もう 考古学なんて やめてしまおうか！| 今からでもさ 身体をマッチョにして|: I'm not doing archeology anymore! I mean,|what's wrong with getting a little more macho|and going on a road trip with you, right?

20.「……なんてね。ウソだよ。| だから そんな困った顔を しないでくれ。| キミは: I can't believe it. That's a lie. So don't|make such a troubled face. You really are a|kind person.

21.「キミは 私のために | このルーペを 探しだしてくれた。| キミが得することな: You found these loupes for me. You don't|deserve any of this.

22.「フフ。キミみたいに ステキな人が友達なのに| 私も クサッてなんか いられない: Fufu. I can't be a jerk when I have a|wonderful person like you as a friend, can I?

23.「考古学が大好きだから こんなに くやしいし | 捨て去ることなんて できそうに: I love archaeology so much, it's such a|bummer, and I don't think I could ever get rid|of it.

24.「今日は そばにいてくれて ありがとう。 | いつかキミが 助けを必要としている: Thank you for being there for me today.|Someday, if you ever need help, I'll be there|for you.

25.「さて そろそろ 下に戻ろうか。| 遅くなってしまったから| クロニコが 心配し: Well, it's time to get back downstairs.|Chronico might be worried about me since it's|getting late.

26.「ぜぇぜぇ…… かっ 勝ったの……か？: Oh, man, did we win...or what?

27.「や やった！| <cs_pchero>との 友情パワーで| 魔物を 倒した……: Yes! ...I...defeated the monsters with the|power of friendship with <cs_pchero>...!

28.「これは……？| ファラスの手記では なさそうだな。| どれどれ……: Is this...? It doesn't look like Faras's|journal. Let's see...

29.今日は 友人と３人で 年に一度の夜祭りへ|出かけた。親友のアイツと それから……:
Today, a friend of mine and I went to the|annual night festival with three other|persons. My best friend, that guy, and... her,|
|who came a little later.

30.いつもは 静かなこの地も 祭りの夜には |色とりどりの灯りで あざやかに彩られ|: This normally quiet place is filled with|colorful lights and the sound of people's|voices on festival nights.

31.珍しい食べ物に ゆかいな催し物 美しい花火……|夢か幻のような時の中で 私たちは: We laughed and laughed in a time that seemed|like a dream or a vision. And just as we were|about to head home...

32.ふたりが先日 婚約したという話を聞いた。|両者とも 人として尊敬できる 大切な友: I heard that they got engaged the other day.|Both of them are dear friends whom I respect|as persons. I offered my congratulations.

33.その後 私たちは 我々３人にとって|思い出の場所である丘で 流星をながめながら|:
Afterwards, we stood on a hill, a memorable|place for all three of us, watching the|meteors and pledging our everlasting|
|friendship.

34.ふたりに出会うことができて 本当によかった。|この先 何があっても 私たち３人な:
I am so glad that I was able to meet you both.|I know that no matter what happens in the|future, the three of us will be able to laugh|
|our way through it.

35.「め……目がッ！！ | ブリリアントすぎて 目がしみるぅぅ！！: My eyes! They're so brilliant, they sting!

36.「わ 私の経験した 灰色の青春とは | 異次元の 輝きぶりに| ヒストリカ イズ: I've experienced a different level of|brilliance in my gray youth... Historica is|Jurassic Panic!

38.「しかし 彼はなぜ あんな強力な魔物を……| よほど日記を 見られたくなかったの: But why would he want such a powerful|monster... so badly that he didn't want anyone|to see his diary? Linjara is a very shy boy.

It's been a while since I've had a vigorous|workout, so my body is feeling a little more|tired than I expected. I think I'll take a|
|little rest outside.

40.「わっ…… 私の研究をジャマする奴は| 誰であっても 許さんぞ！: I will not allow anyone to interfere with my|research!

44.「ウィ！ 承知した！ 帰らないんだな！ | ならば兄は ひとりで帰るぞォ！: Whee! Yes! You're not going home! Then he's|going home alone!

48.「この先には もっと苦しいことしか無いぞ。| まだ 恥をかきたいのか？| お前に: There's only more pain ahead. You still want|to humiliate yourself? Have you no pride?

50.「私は <pc>に あきらめないと誓った。| ならば 恥をかいても カッコ悪くて:
I swore to that I would never|give up. Then it is my pride to keep it, no|matter how embarrassing or uncool it may|
|be!!!!

51.「兄さんの言うとおり | 私は 学会で 皆から失笑を買ったよ。| 今でも くやし: You were right, I was laughed at by everyone|at the conference. I'm still bitter and|bitter. But...

52.「私は これのおかげで| 学問を 楽しいと思えるようになったし| こんなに 夢中: It's made learning fun for me, and I've found|something I'm so passionate about.

53.「今 苦しいからって この研究をやめたら | きっと この先 一生後悔すると思う:
If I stop this research just because I'm in|pain now, I'm sure I'll regret it for the rest|of my life. That's why I don't want to give up|
|so easily.

66.「シャラーップ！ ブラザー！| と…友達ならいる！ ここにいるぞ！！| 私のズッ: Shallap! Brother! and... if you're my friend,|I'm here! I'm here!!! It's my|zuppleseholdc!!!!

|about Warataro!

|didn't you?

77.「ち ちがう！ あれは まだ | 証拠となる遺跡が 見つかっていないだけで| 古: No, no, no! It's just that we haven't yet|found any evidence of the existence of the|ancient Ethene Kingdom, and this journal...

84.「ジュ～～～～～～～～～～ル！！| ヒストリカ！ 元気にしていたかァい！: Ju～～～～～～～～～～le! Historica! How are you doing?

99.「キミはすばらしい人だ！ | 僕には 有能なエージェントがいてね。| キミの話は: You are a wonderful person! I have a very|capable agent. He told me all about you.
